metadata.synopsis: Players jump on the fake elevator to the shar temple. It doesn't work from the side of the ketheric city. Only for one character because it's not guaranteed another will be able to reach the elevator also.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Jump to the elevator to the shar temple at -686; 10; 255 (It's nigh imppossible).

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That's it, then. I can't jump any further.
